mapper.delete: delete from edu_course_favorites where id in (${value})
mapper.update: update edu_course_favorites SET id = #{id}, course_id = #{courseId}, user_id = #{userId}, add_time = #{addTime} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT edu_course.`name` as name, edu_course.`title` as title, edu_course.`lose_abs_time` as loseAbsTime, edu_course.logo as logo, edu_course.`id`as courseId FROM edu_course LEFT JOIN edu_course_favorites ON edu_course_favorites.`course_id`=edu_course.`id` group by edu_course_favorites.course_id order by count(*) desc limit 3
